column4: Hi guys back again, just wanna say 2 things, 1 thanks I got my wireless working, 2 last prob, how do i get my graphics working? it says ATI accelerated graphics driver is in the restricted drivers section I have followed this guide https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/ATI but it hasnt worked for me, any ideas guys?
anyone? just a quick pointer uin the direction will do! :)
Update your sources, especially enable universe.
